I think GStreamer is awesome. It’s got an insane level of capability and yet has a reasonable command-line which lets you explore a wide swath of common cases with ease. Unfortunately, it also has a significant learning curve to get past the most basic use cases, and I have been frustrated to find very little guidance to ease folks into the system via my language of choice, Python.

So here we are. This site will include the best working examples I have of doing various things with and around GStreamer, using python 3 and the gobject-introspection bindings.

So, to get started, let’s take a brief look at how to get a Python-gi-based GStreamer program working.
